entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:45 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 9:40 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 10.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 10.0°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
